heading: This Afternoon
text: Cloudy. Showers likely; thunderstorms and periods of heavy rain possible, mainly from the Route 4, Orange County, and the White Mountains southward. Highs from the mid 60s to around 70, some lower 60s northeast. Southeast winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph in the Champlain Valley, and to 30 mph along the western slopes of the Greens.

heading: Tonight
text: becoming light east of the Greens Mountains; 5 to 10 mph west of the Greens, gusting to 15 mph in the Champlain Valley, and becoming west in the St. Lawrence Valley.

heading: Cloudy. Showers likely early in the south, in the Northeast Kingdom, and in New Hampshire, otherwise scattered and diminishing overnight. Lows in the mid to upper 50s northeast and in the Adirondacks, upper 50s to lower 60s elsewhere west of the Greens. Winds from the south
text: becoming light east of the Greens Mountains; 5 to 10 mph west of the Greens, gusting to 15 mph in the Champlain Valley, and becoming west in the St. Lawrence Valley.

heading: Friday
text: Mostly to partly cloudy. Chance of a morning shower; then chance in the afternoon, mainly from the Adirondacks and Route 2 northward, and in the southern Greens. Highs from the upper 60s to mid 70s north, and mid to upper 70s in the south. Winds becoming west 5 to 10 mph.
